name: Judges
description:
Judges is a Side-Scrolling Rogue-Like Beat-Em-Up Based upon the Biblical book of Judges.

The Work-In-Progress game was developed over 6 months, as a creative project for Honours, investigating biblical storytelling in video games. Play as either Othniel or Ehud and take back the promised land from the Philistine army.

Developed by: Daniel Holmes
Supervised by: Sean Fitzpatrick
Through: the Griffith Film School
Inspired by: Judges 3:16.
If you are older than 18, please fill out This Survey before playing the game, as part of the honours research I am conducting.
